ServerReturnMessages.Subject: Delayed delivery notice: <#message.header["Subject:"]>
ServerReturnMessages.BodyTextRtf: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Verdana;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset186 Verdana;}{\f2\fswiss\fcharset186{\*\fname Arial;}Arial Baltic;}{\f3\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green64\blue128;\red255\green0\blue0;\red0\green128\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\f0\fs20 This e-mail is generated by the Server(\cf1 <#relay.hostname>\cf0 ) to notify you, \par \lang1061\f1 that \lang1033\f0 your message to \cf1 <#relay.to>\cf0 dated \b\fs16 <#message.header["Date:"]>\b0 \fs20 could not be sent at the first attempt.\par \par Recipient \i <#relay.to>'\i0 s Server (\cf1 <#relay.session_hostname>\cf0 ) returned the following response: \cf2 <#relay.error>\cf0\par \par \par Please note Server will attempt to deliver this message for \b <#relay.undelivered_after>\b0 hours.\par \par --------\par \par Your original message is attached to this e-mail (\b data.eml\b0 )\par \par \fs16 The tracking number for this message is \cf3 <#relay.session_messageid>\cf0\fs20\par \lang1061\f2\par \pard\lang1033\f3\fs17\par }

ServerReturnMessages.Subject: Undelivered notice: <#message.header["Subject:"]>
ServerReturnMessages.BodyTextRtf: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Verdana;}{\f1\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset186 Verdana;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset0 Verdana;}{\f3\fnil\fcharset186 Verdana;}{\f4\fswiss\fcharset0 Arial;}{\f5\fswiss\fcharset186{\*\fname Arial;}Arial Baltic;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green64\blue128;\red255\green0\blue0;\red0\green128\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\f0\fs20 Your message t\lang1061\f1 o \cf1\lang1033\f2 <#relay.to>\cf0\f0 , dated \b\fs16 <#message.header["Date:"]>\b0\fs20 , could not be delivered.\par \par Recipient \i <#relay.to>'\i0 s Server (\cf1 <#relay.session_hostname>\cf0 ) returned the following response: \cf2 <#relay.error>\cf0\par \par \par \b * Server will not attempt to deliver this message anymore\b0 .\par \par --------\par \par Your original message is attached to this e-mail (\b data.eml\b0 )\par \par \fs16 The tracking number for this message is \cf3 <#relay.session_messageid>\cf0\fs20\par \lang1061\f5\par \lang1033\f2\par }
